body.name: HTTWCOD Smart Watch (Answer/Make Call), 1.95" Display Smart Watch for Women Men, Fitness Watch with Multi Modes, IP68 Waterproof, Step Calorie Counter, Sleep/Heart Rate Monitoring Watches (Pink)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 10 mins
features: 【Bluetooth Call and Message Notification】Stay connected with Bluetooth call functionality and receive all of your important messages and notifications with message push. Keep track of your daily activities with motion recording, which includes step counting, distance tracking, and calorie counting.

1.95'' Large Screen Smart Watch and Customize Watch Face】With a sleek 1.95 inch, IPS high-definition large screen display, you can easily view all of your important information at a glance. The smart watch app contains more than 200+ online watch faces of different styles, as well a

【24/7 Health Monitoring & Multi-Sport Mode】The smart watch supports heart rate and blood oxygen sleep monitoring, always pay attention to your health status. The fitness tracker also has a multi-sport mode, which supports outdoor running, indoor running, walking, rope skipping, swimming, cycling, mountain climbing, and other sports modes to meet the needs of different sports enthusiasts. Based on real-time heart rate monitoring and algorithm analysis, real-time presents relevant sports data.

【Smart Watch Compatible with iPhone Android Phones】This smart watch is compatible with most iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher smart phones(Not for PC or tablet). Pair the smart watch to your phone and receive all incoming calls, messages, apps notifications straight to your smartwatch including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Whatsapp, and more.

【IP68 Waterproof & Long Battery Life Watch】The smart watch is equipped with an all-metal body and is equipped with IP68 level waterproof, which can be worn normally when washing hands daily or in the rain (Note: please do not use the fitness tracker watch in diving, sauna or hot water). The smart watch is designed with a large-capacity and low-power battery, which can last up to 5-7 days in daily use and 30 days on standby. It is recommended to charge for the first time for two hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bluetooth Call ＆ Smart Notification Once successfully connected, you won't miss calls or messages from your phone, the watch will vibrate to alert you, and you can even call back on the watch Weather Display When the fitness tracker watch is connected with app,the weather will be updated within three hoursyou can real-time understanding of temperature changes, timely response to severe weather Bluetooth Music Control After connecting the mobile phone Bluetooth, you can click to control the previous song, next song, play, pause and other operations of the phone, and also can play music through smartwatch for iphone Audio.

Physiological Cycle Reminder Keep track of your personal cycle and set reminders through the “FitCloudPro”APP to give yourself more care. You can track your menstrual time and symptoms, record menstrual changes, predict ovulation and learn more about your body. Health Reminder Sedentary reminder: smart watch can remind you go and move every per hour. Water Drinking reminder: you can choose reminder interval from 30-180 minutes Camera Remote Control When you are traveling or taking pictures of the whole family and there is no one to take pictures for you, you can control your phone's shooting through your watch, record your beautiful moments with your family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: With features like activity tracking, heart rate monitoring, and sleep tracking, you can keep tabs on your health and fitness without breaking a sweat. Plus, with smartphone notifications right on your wrist, you'll never miss a beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's great. I am not good at these kinds of electronic product, but It’s easy for me to set and connect the watch with app. You can check your heart rate, blood oxygen, step count, etc., which is very helpful during working out . The design of the dial can be changed at will, many different kinds of options. It can also measure sleep quality. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best price and Good Quality watch. Does it job well!
reviews.reviewText: This watch is fantastic and my daughter loves it! For the price, you really can't beat all of the great features it has. The large screen displays the time very clearly and there are so many cute dial face options to choose from, which my daughter enjoys customizing.The sleep tracking give data about her sleep habits and duration. The reminders to drink water are also incredibly useful. Overall, this watch has been a wonderful upgrade from her old Garmin. The stylish design, customizable dial, and useful health features like sleep and hydration tracking make this the perfect watch for an active teen. We are so happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars se ve bien, lo único es que la correa gris no es muy bonita. Pero se puede cambiar
reviews.reviewText: El reloj es lindo, es grande, la manilla gris no es muy bonita pero se puedeCambiar

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the look of the watch and the many options but this thing has a mind of its own. It doesn't hold a charge for more than 3 days. It changes dial faces on its own. While sitting talking with a friend it changed faces 3 times! It shows no historical data for heart rate or oxygen levels. Several other reviews mentioned blood pressure but if this watch has it I can't find it. I'm still trying to decide if I'm going to keep it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband loves it!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for his birthday he loves that his phone can stay in his pocket and everything comes right there on the watch. He talk to texts with me all day and can call anyone in his contacts handsfree while at work with his airpods in and he said this was the only thing he was missing! The color is a nice deep royal blue not.too bright but not blackish either so it goes with anything. Thank you amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch/health tracker
reviews.reviewText: Nice watch. As advertised, good features, good battery life. It has amazing health apps and is very easy to use. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good watch
reviews.reviewText: Its amazing product, especially for my kids, after they downloaded the app and connected the phone with the watch, it was really something amazing for them and it tracks all their physical activities and it helps them a lot with their daily life and most importantly the communication between me and my kids is much better now, if they don’t reach the phone they can just answer the phone call from the watch, it is a great product for the price, I love it, I recommend it for all parents.

It is an excellent alternative to an Apple watch and looks exactly like one for a much nicer price. It contains many of the same features that come with an Apple watch. These include an alarm clock, blood pressure monitoring, heart rate and blood oxygen measurement, a movement tracker(includes step count, calorie count, and distance along with an advanced sports mode for specialized activities such as yoga or biking), weather forecast, a sleep monitor and more. The watch can be easily connected to your phone and unlocks more features such as receiving calls, music and find my phone. It keeps an accurate step count. Another great perk is the battery life. Battery lasts about 2-3 days before having to get fully recharged. Overall very sleek and stylish design and I highly recommend purchasing as a budget friendly alternative!

I got my new watch yesterday I like it but the charger cord wasn't in the box So I don't know what to do I can't find the refund button or how do I find or get the missing charge cord if anyone can help me

reviews.reviewerName: Phu To Truong K ToPhu To Truong K To
reviews.reviewTitle: Unbeatable Value! Excellent functionality, style and comfort!
reviews.reviewText: The watch's design is sleek and modern, making it suitable for both men and women. The 1.8-inch display is crystal clear and easy to read, even in bright sunlight. The touch screen is very responsive and works smoothly.The watch's health monitoring features are a standout for me. The blood oxygen, heart rate, and sleep trackers are accurate and provide helpful insights into my overall health and wellness. The fitness tracker is also excellent, tracking my workouts and providing detailed metrics to help me improve my fitness.

Not a bad watch for the price but definitely lacking some basic features. All notifications are by vibration only. While the watch does have a mic and speaker, it doesn't have any sounds for when you set an alarm or timer or get a notification, all you get a (weak for me even at strong setting) vibration on your wrist. Not so great if you wanted to use the watch to wake up or forgot to turn the volume up on your phone. Also, while there is a nice selection of watch faces, you can only replace what is stored on the watch with one extra face at a time. You always have 8 pre-loaded faces and only 1 space to upload to. I've only been wearing the watch for one day. Everything seems to be functioning normally. Went for a walk and it tracked ok. Seems to keep a decent heart rate track as well. Bluetooth calls over the watch seem to work well and with sufficient volume as does the "digital assistant" function. It goes directly to my google assistant function on my phone. It would be nice if the media controls were able to read the ID3 tags from MP3s and show them on the watch as well. I'm still undecided if it will be going back just for the lack of alarm sounds.
